title: Disney has 20% off almost everything this week - but you'll need a discount code
text:
Get the biggest money stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

We're not sure who loves Disney more, us or our little ones, but we know who prefers a decent discount...

Disney has just announced that it's doing 20% off almost everything on its ShopDisney online store this week.

To get the impressive 20% discount, you'll need to enter the voucher code MAGIC20 at the checkout, with the screen then refreshing to show your new total price.

If you want free delivery to go with, simply enter the code WOODY afterwards for free standard delivery (usually £3.95), with both codes working together to get you a double discount.

The 20% off Disney discount code should work on most things on the site, with the brand noting that the only things that aren't included are Frozen 2 and Star Wars products as they're already on a multi-buy deal, any items already on sale, or anything that is from a Disney partner, rather than Disney iteslf.

Sadly, it also excludes Disney Parks, theme parks and show tickets too, before you start booking off your annual leave...

Having started yesterday (21 October), the code will last all this week, ending on Sunday night (27 October).

Excited fans are already sharing pictures of what they've bought on deals forum HotUKDeals, so we've listed some of our favourite bargains of the lot below.
description: There's also another Disney discount code too that gets you free delivery too - as well as your 20% off
